title: Still getting speaker buzz/vibration on Pixel 3XL...
content:
Examples: https://music.youtube.com/watch?v=1ZYbU82GVz4 and https://music.youtube.com/watch?v=lUarB-sgC00

When listening at volumes you'd listen to when trying to sleep the vibration and buzz is audible at distance when it's quiet.

Is this just my device or the same for everyone with the Pixel 3XL even after the update? 

Quite the opposite of relaxing and stress relief I must say!
